metadata.title: Charming Cottage in Sologne
metadata.description: Discover L'Instant Tranquille, a charming cottage in the heart of Sologne. The perfect holiday rental for a nature getaway, between Loire Valley castles and forests.

home.heroSubtitle: Your nature retreat in the heart of Sologne
home.introText: Nestled in the heart of Sologne's forests, L'Instant Tranquille offers an idyllic setting for a rejuvenating getaway. Just a short drive from the Loire Valley castles, enjoy the absolute calm of the French countryside.
home.highlightNatureDesc: In the heart of 3 hectares of nature, between forest and ponds, an exceptional setting to recharge.
home.highlightComfortDesc: A fully renovated character house, combining old-world charm with modern comfort.
home.highlightLocationDesc: 30 min from Chambord and Cheverny, the perfect starting point to explore the Loire Valley castles.
home.highlightCalmDesc: Far from urban bustle, enjoy the silence, birdsong, and starry skies at night.

cottage.title: The Cottage
cottage.description: Discover our charming Sologne house, fully renovated for your comfort.
cottage.descriptionText: L'Instant Tranquille is an authentic Sologne brick-and-timber house, nestled in a lush green setting. Carefully renovated throughout, it combines the charm of traditional architecture with modern comfort. Its 120m² comfortably accommodates up to 6 guests.
